newFeatures.feature: Added release notes page for users and developers to track new features

bugFixes.bug: Users can now submit words with capital or lowercase letters, the checking is no longer case sensitive.
Users are no longer allowed to submit numeric values to the global daily game.

improvements.improvement: Icon color and size styling is improved on the release notes page.

additionalResources.additionalResource: View the release notes page for reference at: https://thewordguessgame.com/releaseNotes

notification.title: Update
notification.description: You no longer have to worry about capitalization in your guesses

improvements.improvement: New logo has been added and color schemes are beginning to be applied throught the site.

notification.title: New logo and color scheme
notification.description: Our branding has improved with a logo and color scheme!

releases.title: Subscribe
releases.description: Add your email to our subscription service to get emailed the latest and greatest game features to stay up to date with our game progress!

newFeatures.feature: Users can submit their email for subscription to get latest news and updates on our game

notification.title: Subscription emails are here
notification.description: Users can now opt in to submitting their email to get the latest newsletters on the newest updates and features. Don't worry, we won't spam you

releases.title: Answers shown upon failure
releases.description: If a user is unsuccessful on guessing the correct guess, they are now notified of the correct answer.

newFeatures.feature: Users are now shown the correct answer whether they guess the correct answer before their attempts are up or if their attempts are up they are shown the answer

notification.title: Answers shown
notification.description: Answers in the global daily guess game are now shown when a user does not guess the correct guess in their amount of attempts
